name: Deacon's Adventure
description:
Fair Warning: There's flashing lights when you die.


**Currently updating the game to alleviate slow down, as well as fix some code that won't let you unpause if you have a controller plugged in, lol woops

I worked on this game 2013 - 2015. I don't think I plan to go back to it, so here's a playable demo of what I've made. It was mostly inspired by Zelda 2 and Metroid.

Controls:

Z - slash sword

X - jump, next text

Arrow Keys - move, crouch, climb

Shift - change boots

Enter - save, pause/unpause, continue/quit (on game over screen)

miscellaneous:

F1 - open controls menu

Escape - exit controls menu / exit game

F4 - toggle fullscreen

F9 - save screenshot png. in local files

M - mute sound

U - unmute sound
